SELECT opnd.*,nvl(nvl(s.stock_num,0)-nvl(notice.num,0),0) stock_num from out_pick_notice_detail opnd left join ( select sum(stock_num-lock_num) as stock_num, materials,wbs from r_stock group by materials,wbs ) s on s.materials = opnd.materials and s.wbs = opnd.wbs inner join ( select sum(nd.pick_num-nd.tallyed_num)as num, nd.materials,nd.wbs from OUT_PICK_NOTICE_DETAIL nd left join out_pick_notice n on nd.pick_notice=n.pick_id where n.pick_notice_state='pickNoticeCommit' group by nd.materials,nd.wbs )notice on notice.materials = s.materials and notice.wbs = s.wbs
opnd.pick_notice = #{pickId}
